pli-tv-bi-vb-pc65:2.1: The nuns’ rules and their analysis
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc65:3.1: The chapter on offenses entailing confession
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc65:5.1: 65. The training rule on married girls
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc65:6.1: At one time the Buddha was staying at Sāvatthī in the Jeta Grove, Anāthapiṇḍika’s Monastery.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc65:6.2: At that time the nuns gave the full ordination to married girls less than twelve years old.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc65:6.3: They were unable to patiently endure cold and heat; hunger and thirst; contact with horseflies, mosquitoes, wind, the burning sun, and creeping animals and insects; rude and unwelcome speech;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc65:6.4: they were unable to bear up with bodily feelings that are painful, severe, sharp, and destructive of life.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc65:7.1: The nuns of few desires complained and criticized them,
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc65:7.2: “How can nuns give the full ordination to married girls less than twelve years old?” …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc65:7.3: “Is it true, monks, that nuns do this?”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc65:7.6: How can the nuns give the full ordination to married girls less than twelve years old?
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc65:7.7: A married girl less than twelve years old is unable to patiently endure cold and heat; hunger and thirst; contact with horseflies, mosquitoes, wind, the burning sun, and creeping animals and insects; rude and unwelcome speech;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc65:7.8: she’s unable to bear up with bodily feelings that are painful, severe, sharp, and destructive of life.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc65:7.9: But a married girl who is twelve years old is able to endure these things.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc65:7.11: This will not give rise to confidence in those without it …
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc65:7.12: And, monks, the nuns should recite this training rule thus:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc65:8.1: ‘If a nun gives the full ordination to a married girl who is less than twelve years old, she commits an offense entailing confession.’”
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc65:9.4: … The nun who has been given the full ordination by both complete Orders through a legal procedure consisting of one motion and three announcements that is irreversible and fit to stand—this sort of nun is meant in this case.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc65:10.1: Who is less than twelve years old:
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc65:10.2: who has not reached twelve years of age.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc65:10.4: one who has gone to the place of a man is what is meant.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc65:11.1: If, intending to give the full ordination, she searches for a group, a teacher, a bowl, or a robe, or she establishes a boundary, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc65:11.2: After the motion, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc65:11.3: After each of the first two announcements, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc65:11.4: When the last announcement is finished, the preceptor commits an offense entailing confession;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc65:11.5: the group and the teacher commit an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc65:12.1: If the girl is less than twelve years old, and she perceives her as less than twelve, and she gives her the full ordination, she commits an offense entailing confession.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc65:12.2: If the girl is less than twelve years old, but she is unsure if she is, and she gives her the full ordination, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc65:12.3: If the girl is less than twelve years old, but she perceives her as more than twelve, and she gives her the full ordination, there is no offense.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc65:13.1: If the girl is more than twelve years old, but she perceives her as less than twelve, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc65:13.2: If the girl is more than twelve years old, but she is unsure if she is, she commits an offense of wrong conduct.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc65:13.3: If the girl is more than twelve years old, and she perceives her as more than twelve, there is no offense.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc65:14.2: if she gives the full ordination to a girl less than twelve years old, but she perceives her as more than twelve;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc65:14.3: if she gives the full ordination to a girl more than twelve years old, and she perceives her as more than twelve;
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc65:14.5: if she is the first offender.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc65:15.1: The fifth training rule is finished.
